name: Pink Targets
description:
You must shoot 7 pink targets to win. Shoot your opponent to steal a point.

Controls:
Up/W: Stand Up
Left/D: Shoot (hold to aim)
Right/A: Throw grenade

Grenades stun the player for a few seconds. You start with two: Shoot a green target to get one.

Made with Javascript ;no engine, no library used!
